strings:
<se_low>Chen Mui: Where are you going!?
You must introduce yourself to the Elders.

<se_low>*: Oh, you're <hero>, are you?
My, haven't you grown into a fine young man!?

<se_low>Yangus: You've got the wrong bloke, lady.
I ain't the guv!
<se_low>Yangus: An' anyhow, 'ow come you know the guv then, eh?

<se_high>Jessica: Huh!? Are you serious!?
Surely you're not mistaking me for <hero>!

<se_high>Jessica: I could understand you mistaking one of
the other guys for him, but I'm a woman!
I've got...and I haven't got...I mean,
there are obvious differences!

<se_def>Angelo: Please! I'm not <hero>!
Oh, no. We're very different!

<se_def>Angelo: Notice my dashing good looks?
The glint in my eye?
My tendency to smoulder captivatingly?<page>Angelo: ...My...hair? Hm.
I think your eyesight must be going, old girl!

<voice_0x010017A5><se_low>Chen Mui: I see. It would take powerful warriors indeed
to overcome the strength of the Lord of the Dragovians.
<voice_0x010017A6><se_low>Chen Mui: Which makes <hero> and these humans perfect for the task.
<voice_0x010017A7><se_low>Chen Mui: Indeed, their valour has been acknowledged by none less than the Godbird Empyrea.
<voice_0x010017A8><se_low>*: The Godbird Empyrea!?
<voice_0x010017A9><se_low>Chen Mui: I hesitate to ask any more of you when you already journey under such a terrible burden, <leader>.

<voice_0x010017AA><se_low>Chen Mui: But before you confront Rhapthorne, I would ask that you face the Lord of the Dragovians. Think of it as a personal request from me.
Will you accept?

<voice_0x010017AB><se_low>Chen Mui: I had faith in you from the very start.
Simply hearing that lifts my spirits immensely.
<voice_0x010017AC><se_low>Chen Mui: Please come to my home, where I will prepare a cheese banquet suitable for great heroes such as yourselves.
<voice_0x010017AD><se_low>Chen Mui: I beg of you to reconsider, <leader>.
<voice_0x010017AE><se_low>Chen Mui: This is a golden opportunity to rebuild the bridge between the societies of humans and Dragovians.
<voice_0x010017AF><se_low>Chen Mui: The futures of both of our races lie in your hands. Now, can I count on your help?

<se_high>Red: You want yer eyes testin', you do!
Me an' <hero> don't look nuffin' like each other!
<se_high>Red: Stone me, I must be gettin' on if people are mistakin' me for a bloke! Looks like I need to find some secret treasure or somefin' that stops agein' in its tracks.

<se_low>Morrie: Ah ha ha! You are pulling off my legs, ay?
Of course, I am not the young ragazzo.
<se_low>Morrie: No, I am the owner of the celebrated Monster Arena <endash> the pit of PASSION and POWER!
<se_low>Morrie: Si, I.........am MORRIE MOZZARELLA!
